body_html:
This workaround produces the following lines in vocab.txt:
b'\xd0\xb8' 3185432

Is there any way to load these sequences as utf8 strings (str) besides using eval()?

I think it would be better to store utf8-strings in the vocab as utf8-encoded file.
For now it seems to be weird for me:
it is bytes object representation saved in file

body:
This workaround produces the following lines in vocab.txt:
`b'\xd0\xb8' 3185432`

Is there any way to load these sequences as utf8 strings (str) besides using `eval()`?

I think it would be better to store utf8-strings in the vocab as utf8-encoded file.
For now it seems to be weird for me:
it is `bytes` object representation saved in file
